abstract: Market influences should be putting wind in deal makers' sails, but the Deal Professor says the overall trend is that of M.&A. rushing toward a cliff.
snippet: Market influences should be putting wind in deal makers' sails, but the Deal Professor says the overall trend is that of M.&A. rushing toward a cliff.

headline.main: As Economy Goes, So Go Takeovers, Even as Bargains Abound
headline.print_headline: As the Economy Goes, So Go Takeovers, Even Though Bargains Abound
